phrs.translation: 管理评审，管理审查；管理评论

sentences.sentence: Richard Coles reviews all the latest video releases.
sentences.translation: 理查德•科尔斯对最近发行的所有录像做了评论。

sentences.sentence: The bad reviews of her new book were very hurtful to her.
sentences.translation: 对她的新书的负面评论使她很难过。

sentences.sentence: I clicked on a link and recent reviews of the production came up.
sentences.translation: 我点击了一个链接，最近的演出评论就出来了。
